拒.definition: to resist; to repel; to refuse

拒之門外.definition: to lock one's door and refuse to see sb

拒付.definition: to refuse to accept a payment; to refuse to pay; to stop (a check or payment)

拒保.definition: to refuse to insure; to exclude from insurance coverage

拒接.definition: to reject; to refuse to take a call

拒收.definition: to reject; to refuse to accept

拒絕.definition: to refuse; to decline; to reject

拒腐防變.definition: to fight corruption and forestall moral degeneration

拒載.definition: to refuse to take a passenger (of taxi)

拒馬.definition: cheval de frise (a type of barrier)
